title: Perfect outfit ideas for every mood
text:
Whenever you’re overwhelmed with fashion choices because either you have too many clothes to choose from or you feel like you have nothing to wear, basing your outfit around your mood — or, alternatively, dressing to uplift your mood — is a great strategy to try. New research shows that what you wear has the ability to change your mood. The right clothes can leave you feeling beautiful and confident, while the wrong ones can bring your confidence level crashing to the ground. This video will give you some fashion inspo and brighten your mood at the same time.

Next Story : Indian women are running up a storm!
description: This interesting video will give you some fashion inspiration and brighten your mood, all at the same time.
